thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Geraldine
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Geraldine

author: Geraldine
title: Geraldine
text:
I have used Fast Cover Travel Insurance a few times now, both for overseas travel and for domestic.
The application process is easy, with the "items covered" section very easy to read.
The cost of the insurance provided is very competitive - I have shopped around!
I have had one occasion to claim, after a cruise where almost every passenger contracted some kind of "flu". The claim was easy to lodge and the refund was fast and fair.
